name: Chroma Tower
description:
Chroma Tower

The tower, you see it in your dreams, it beckons you. 
Are you up to the challenge to climb it to the top and confront your destiny? 

Controls

Arrow Keys/wads - Move
Spacebar/ Z/J/K - jump
Esc = Pause
M - Mute BGM

Tips

Pressing the jump button while bouncing of things will get you higher

The html5 export from this godot version has some issues with audio clipping, and performance is not great, so I recommend you to play an actual version you can install for a better experience

How to install

Most versions of the game are flagged as threats but they are false positives (probably due to the embed pck export options from godot)
To install in mac press ctrl click and select run - https://support.apple.com/guide/mac-help/open-a-mac-app-from-an-unidentified-dev... 
In android the file has self signed certificates so its also flagged as unsafe, you will need to press install anyway while installing the apk
